title: What's the song that goes “lalala” sung by 2 men? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you may be the thinking of The Boxer by Simon and Garfunkel. It has a similar feel to Hey Jude by the Beatles, where the second half of Hey Jude consists of repeating the same phrase over and over with variations, in a similar manner the Boxer repeats lalala over and over.
